name: Max Payne 3: Local Justice Map Pack
name_original: Max Payne 3: Local Justice Map Pack
description:
Max Payne 3: Local Justice Map Pack is an action-shooter game developed by Rockstar Vancouver. It came out on 17-07-2012. Rockstar Games published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Max Payne 3: Local Justice Map Pack is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
